trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived"></xref> and <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously collect the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream output of a process, you must create a method that handles the redirected stream output events.
trans-unit.target: De forma assíncrona coletar o redirecionamento <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>ou <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>fluxo de saída de um processo, você deve criar um método que trata os eventos de saída do fluxo redirecionado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event-handler method is called when the process writes to the redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: O método do manipulador de eventos é chamado quando o processo grava o fluxo redirecionado.

trans-unit.source: The event delegate calls your event handler with an instance of DataReceivedEventArgs.
trans-unit.target: O delegado de evento chama o manipulador de eventos com uma instância do DataReceivedEventArgs.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> property contains the text line that the process wrote to the redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>propriedade contém a linha de texto que gravou o processo para o fluxo redirecionado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the line of characters that was written to a redirected <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> output stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a linha de caracteres que foram gravada para um redirecionamento <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> fluxo de saída.

trans-unit.source: The line that was written by an associated <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> to its redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*> stream.
trans-unit.target: A linha que foi gravada por um associado <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> para seu redirecionado <> </> *> ou <> </> *> fluxo.
